summary:
Do you want more random vanilla events ? This mod is for you.
Now every road can offer you adventures !
descriptionHtml:
For awhile now I\'ve been longing for more life on the road.
BUT I wanted it to be authentic. I changed it while playing around with the CK.
I put it here for you all, if you\'re interested. Just a simple trick really...
I\'ve included different settings for many tastes, from 10% to 100%.
If someone has already posted the same mod, notify me, as i haven\'t seen it, and I\'ll erase mine.

Edit: Here is what the mod does :
it increases mage duels, giants on the roads, skeletons, farmers going to Windhelm or Solitude,
Ma√Øk the liar, patrols, assassins, AND dragon attacks along the other random events.
I don\'t know how to go around the dragon attacks for now. I\'m very new to the Creation Kit.
But I can tell you the feel of the events is genuine. And all the files have the same effect.
Tough a 10% increase is subtler than a 40% obviously.

Check this mod (SKREEE) that does the trick for random dragon spawns :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16724
You just have to load it after mine. Its really good.
author: seckham
